title: Bitstar_coin
author: Bitstar_coin
content: The Giant search Engine Google is Marking its 25 years of being in service and providing services to the entire world. As the popular saying goes 'Google is Your Friend'.*Has Google been your friend?*How long have you been using Google?*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?Let's Talk...

comments.author: JunaidAzizi
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Has Google been your friend?Yes, google has been my friend for a very long time. A friend that helps you in every situation regarding time and issues and Google plays the same role. It's a trusted tool and I am updating myself through Google so I called Google my best friend.Quote*How long have you been using Google?If I am not wrong it has been a long time since I have been using Google since 2009.I grew up with Google and I spend most of my time on it. In my school, I did my homework on Google and nobody knew this till now when I growing up I used it for my research and also for finding the best recipe because I loved cooking at that time. And now I use it for many purposes.Quote *Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)No, I do not prefer any search engine to anyone else because my experience with Google is better, and recommend it to everyone to use Google as it provides the best services from any other engines.Quote*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think is not included assuming it is possible?Not as such improvement but one thing that I desire that Google has to improve and that is to reduce the fake and unauthentic websites. In today's time if you search for something a lot of websites show which 3 or 4 is related to my question and the rest of the website are useless and are not the answer to my question. So if Google controls it and just provides the answer of what the keywords are searching then would be much better.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Has Google been your friend?Yes, totally I use it from time to time since there's a lot of information need to search and google had all the answer regarding on topic we want to search. I believe all crypto users use google daily since they can surf a lot of information especially the current news then also the other more things they want to search.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*How long have you been using Google?Since High School days and until now which I participate in any crypto activities I still use this, maybe around 15 years if I remember it correctly.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)I try to use Brave browser before when they launch it but I go back to Google since I think this is more convenient.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?Maybe proper dectecting of phising and fake sites then block it on their platform. Aside that nothing else because google is already a good site.

comments.author: Broly46
comments.body: Some of their services seem very reliable notably email and teamview, cloud computing, but for the search engine it is totally full of junk, I had try to distance myself from it as much as possible, you do not know when it would pull a shenaningan on you like how Snowden Edward analogue to apple services. There is plenty of replacement for search engine, a serach engine is also a honey pot to mass indoctrination, pick a shady search engine you would end in tears too.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on September 27, 2023, 05:36:20 AMSome of their services seem very reliable notably email and teamview, cloud computing, but for the search engine it is totally full of junk, I had try to distance myself from it as much as possible, you do not know when it would pull a shenaningan on you like how Snowden Edward analogue to apple services. There is plenty of replacement for search engine, a serach engine is also a honey pot to mass indoctrination, pick a shady search engine you would end in tears too.Agreed with the search engine full of junk especially scam link topping the search results sometimes can be very dangerous. Many people have fall victim just by clicking on the wrong link and Google been a trusted brand makes it more easier for victims to fall. I think they should do more to filter that area of concern.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Happy Silver Jubilee to Google!Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Has Google been your friend?Of course, Google is my friend if I remove its excesses, it's been more of a friend than otherwise. I've learned a lot of things through it and I don't think a day would pass without seeking information on it, and it has been easily accessible and helpful in almost all facets.Quote*How long have you been using Google?I can't remember correctly anymore, but it should be over 20 years. My only regret is that I didn't envisage the opportunities of earning therein. Quote*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)I don't, and the reason is simple. There is no information needed that can't be found through Google, but there are many that can't be found in others.Quote*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?There is always a need for improvements despite being spectacular. Google needs to stop the issues with sponsored ads where the true information will be pushed lower than it. Also, they need to fight the scam through their ads and reduce misinformation to its barest minimum.

comments.author: Beerwizzard
comments.created_time: September 27, 2023, 06:21:35 AMLast edit: September 27, 2023, 06:40:53 AM by Beerwizzard
comments.body: Since 2017, whenever I've got my adblock off and google for Electrum official website it shows me a phishing link in the ads on top of the search page and no one gives a shit about the reports. So it is kinda doubtful if Google is my friend at the moment.Currently, I'm even using AI tools for the search (perplexity is one of the favorite ones) and this is so much better than the usual google search.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: A big Congratulations to Google for celebrating 25th anniversary, and they have done great things in the whole world and many users have enjoyed their services to find solution to their problem. I started using Google some years ago to learn so many things that made me to be among the best students in the secondary school those days, because I always used Google to research some of the assignments be given to me. Google has been my friend till now because there are some strange words I will come across in the Bitcointalk forum, I will quickly run to Google to find the meaning to improve in that particular topic or comment.

comments.author: DVlog
comments.body: I have been using Google since my journey to the internet. Google can be compared to a kind of assistant who knows everything and always wants to help. Though Google can provide misinformation sometimes, it is the best search engine I have used so far. Bing and DuckDuckGo are better than Google if you want to get only the legit source of information, but they don't have a massive database like Google.

comments.author: Asuspawer09
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AMThe Giant search Engine Google is Marking its 25 years of being in service and providing services to the entire world. As the popular saying goes 'Google is Your Friend'.*Has Google been your friend?*How long have you been using Google?*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?Let's Talk...Google already did a lot in a long way and it definitely helps us in a lot of situations, probably the most popular company, and we can't deny that it is even used by a lot of companies.For Sure Google is my friend since if I doesnt know anything probably the answer to it is Google, it just pretty much knows everything and could easily help you whenever you are if you just have access on it.Been using Google for a very long time, dont really remember when but as soon as I learned about Google and knew what it could do, when I already had the technology like a phone google was already a thing, Probably when I was just on my elementary days I already using google.I've been loyal to google even when the times when Yahoo was still popular I just liked the simple design of it and I really think that using Google Chrome was just faster than others.For sure the technology was a long better than the past years and Google was already so big right now.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Google has been my default search engine for years, I don’t like to use anything Microsoft offers. There are pros & cons to everything but I just feel like my privacy is probably more compromised with Edge & Bing.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Has Google been your friend?Google has become my friend in finding the information I need. And I am satisfied with Google's search engine service.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*How long have you been using Google?Maybe from the start, I have used Google to search for information. But Google wasn't the first search engine I used.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)I still use Google to look for information or something, but I also use the search engine if I don't find the results I want from Google.Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AM*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?Maybe the improvement is so that Google can filter the information we find from Google because now there is a lot of information that is not the result of what we want.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Recently I saw the 25 substituting double O in google while searching for a picture of an Elephant today. Google has been great in optimizing the usage of the internet as a search engine. With its numerous security and privacy flaws on users, many switched to different and more private search engines. Yet they remain the best for marketers. Its numerous marketing tools like adsense, adwords, etc have helped in boosting the reach of potential clients for businesses and companies. Google is the mother of the internet, everything almost revolves around them, people use google chrome, gmail, google cloud services, keyword research tools etc to better their internet experience. And indeed, I can't be excluded among these users, which many of us still falls as a client in one of their multiple services. They have so much power and influence allocated to them on the internet. Site owners want to rank on google to yield traffic. Hence, google is our friend. I'd want google to reduce its updating speed and also make it easier for sites to rank on first page. People can't understand how the ranking algorithm work these days, whether through guest posts, high DA backlinks or top notch quality niche contents, these methods still may not rank a website in today's google ranking analysis. At some point, not now, I'd switch to private search engines and leave google, because of the way it rough handles people's data to feed advertisers. If google is 25 I've been using them for 25 years too, lol. I don't know how long I've been using them, but its been quite a long journey using google.

comments.author: Bitco55
comments.body: Yeah, I also the "25"  substituting the "oo" on Google home page.Google has been a friend, it's been there for me. (LOL, too cringe..¿). Anyways, I remembered this one time I was always on Google... I won't say 24/7 though, that's too much  . But all my questions and problems, I took it all to Google, since I'm not the kind of person who communicates that much.I've been using Google for as long as I can remember, but can't pinpoint when exactly.3. Lately, I've been using Bing more. Google sometimes doesn't give you straight-up answers, and there are lot of information there, you don't know which to trust. But for Bing, it's information is related and not scattered like that on Google.4. As for improvement I'd say they try to fix the problem of not giving me what I want. People sometimes say " Google knows everything", I don't want to go there and become way more confused than I was before typing my questions.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: What other might search engine should I or can I choose as my default. I used almost all the Google tools so indeed Google is part of my eveyrday life i celebrate with them and also beleive one day i will be part of the Google team working remotely with them.

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: I think I have been using google since the first time I used the internet, at first I really thought that Google is a simple database processing, which later on I found that it's really complicated. What really bothers me nowadays is that when I was trying to find a detailed information or reviews about a product like pc stuff, GPU, CPU or Keyboard or anything, the top search result is marketplace, not the official site, or some article/video about the product, even after I specifically add the word 'review'. Now when I want to find those kind of information I use Bing.

comments.author: kingvirtus09
comments.body: It's been a long time since Google has been able to help billions of people around the world, and it continues to help with all the questions we want to know. And not only that, it also gives opportunities to almost countless people who earn money because of Google, and one of them is the one who earns thousands of dollars by making content on YouTube. And even in other opportunities, they are able to work for the company as well.Google is really a great help not only to our adults but also to all students around the world. It also helps in their studies; even those who have not graduated are also gaining knowledge because of Google, which, no matter what question you ask, will immediately provide answer options that match the answer you are looking for. So congratulations on Google's 25 years!

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: I miss the days when "don't be evil" was their motto. Nowadays they know far too much about anyone, and the level of advertising makes YouTube impossible to use without ad blocker.Let me put it this way: I liked Google much more before they got this big.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: 25 years!, how many here are 25 years old, , how many grew up assuming that the search engine was the "god" of information, it is significant then to say that many of us had the opportunity to live that transition, and it still rules 25 years later, although not as freely as before, the destinations of clic to concerns, doubts, learn etc..It is still very "strange thinks" to think how the simplest page (UI and UX) on the entire Internet is the most important.  Note, many negative things could be said, but today is a birthday, we let it pass

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 27, 2023, 04:20:30 AMThe Giant search Engine Google is Marking its 25 years of being in service and providing services to the entire world. As the popular saying goes 'Google is Your Friend'.*Has Google been your friend?*How long have you been using Google?*Do you prefer other search engines than Google lately and can you tell why? (If any)*Is there any improvement would you like to see in Google that you think are not included assuming it is possible?Let's Talk...Happy birthday to Google, I have been using the Google search engine for a long time, I really like its interface and also the accuracy when we search for something from there, apart from that the other products that Google releases (YouTube, Gmail and others) are also very interesting, well they make me addicted but for I prefer to use Microsoft Edge for online reading, all news from around the world is summarized on the front page of Edge.
